title: Induced emf in loop by changing magnetic field

content.prompt: A circular loop of wire of radius R is perpendicular to a magnetic field whose magnitude as a function of time t is given by the equation ùêµ = ùëèùë°2 + ùëêùë° , where b and c are positive, nonzero constants. What is the magnitude of the emf induced in the loop as a function of time t ?
